Package RDFFormats :: Module Store
[show private | hide private]
[frames | no frames]

Module RDFFormats.Store

Storage of nodes according to general RDFFormats conventions.

Classes
AbstractHandler WebOrganiser-compatible handler methods.
AbstractStore The interface employed by the RDFCalendar.Parsers classes.
Store A store class providing, in each instance, a wrapper around an underlying store, convenience attributes based on namespaces from the Format module and node types from the underlying store implementation, and a selection of higher-level operations relevant to parsing and writing.

Function Summary
  open(store_name, store_type, context, **kw)
Open the store with the given 'store_name' of the given 'store_type', providing an optional 'context' where supported.

Function Details

open(store_name, store_type, context=None, **kw) 

Open the store with the given 'store_name' of the given 'store_type',
providing an optional 'context' where supported. Return a tuple consisting
of the store object and the implementation.
